5. To preserve consistency with earlier surveys, the head in consumer units with married couples is assumed to be the husband. Also, for ease of exposition we use the terms household and consumer unit interchangeably.

2. Consumption also has a transitory component and therefore is itself a noisy measure of lifetime welfare. For the reasons described in the text, however, it is undoubtedly a more accurate measure than current income.
